query:
with next_attempt as (
                select coalesce(max(attempt_number) + 1, 1) as attempt_number
                from underway.task_attempt
                where task_id = $1 and
                      task_queue_name = $2
            )
            insert into underway.task_attempt (
                task_id,
                task_queue_name,
                state,
                attempt_number
            ) 
            values (
                $1, 
                $2, 
                $3,
                (select attempt_number from next_attempt)
            )
